hero.title: Handcrafted Tags, Collars & Leashes
hero.title_extension: Infused with Smart Tech for Peace of Mind
hero.description: Discover beautifully designed pet accessories that blend timeless style with cutting-edge safety.

printerSection.description1: Every Pawsitive tag is carefully 3D-printed in our studio with durable, eco-friendly materials. The result? Ultra-light, waterproof, and made to withstand muddy paws, rainy walks, and all the fun in between.
printerSection.description2: But beauty meets function: each tag combines two technologies in one — a tap-friendly NFC chip and a laser-engraved QR code. This way, any smartphone can read your pet’s profile instantly, no matter the situation.

mockup.title: Scan, Call, Reunite
mockup.p1: One quick scan or tap shows your pet’s photo, name, and your contact details — directly on the finder’s phone. With a single tap, they can call you right away. Simple, fast, stress-free.
mockup.p2: And for you? Instant peace of mind. You’ll get an SMS and email alert the very moment your pet’s tag is scanned. No waiting, no guessing — just happy tails and faster reunions.

products.title: Loved by Paws. Trusted by Humans.
products.title_secondary: Explore our handcrafted collars and smart pet tags — built to last, super easy to use, and ready for every wag and adventure.

testimonial.title: I was amazed when someone scanned my dog’s tag and I instantly got an SMS! The collar is beautiful, the tag feels solid, and the idea is just pure genius. Thank you, Pawsitive!

about.title: The Pawsitive Story: Crafted with Love
about.about_description: We are pet parents tired of dull, scratched-up tags that wore out too soon. So we decided to create something better — smart tags that always work, paired with collars and leashes that are truly special.
about.about_description2: From bold paracord weaves to lightweight 3D-printed tags, every product is designed to be unique, functional, and made with love.
about.block_1: Our paracord collars and leashes aren’t just strong — they’re comfortable, colorful, and handwoven with patterns that stand out.
about.block_2: With both NFC and QR, your pet’s profile is always just one scan away. And you choose what information shows up — keeping you in control.
about.block_3: The moment someone scans your tag, you’ll know. No apps, no setup headaches — just instant connection and reassurance.

features.title: What Makes Pawsitive So Special?
features.title_secondary: We bring together craftsmanship, technology, and design into one dependable solution for pets and their people.
features.reason1_text: Collars, leashes, and tags made with meticulous attention to detail.
features.reason2_text: Both NFC and QR for maximum accessibility on any device.
features.reason3_text: Waterproof, lightweight, and always ready for life outdoors.

services.title: What We Offer
services.title_secondary: From lost pet assistance to beautiful product customization — we've got your precious pet covered, always.
services.reason1_text: A wide choice of colors and patterns, tailored to your pet’s personality.
services.reason2_text: SMS + email notifications the moment your tag is scanned.
services.reason3_text: Collars, leashes, and tags crafted with comfort and durability in mind.

reasoning.title: Why Pet Parents Trust Pawsitive
reasoning.title_secondary: From walks to adventures — safety and style you can count on.

ctasection.title: Give your pet more than just a collar.
ctasection.title_secondary: Explore our delightful collection and discover how safety can look this utterly amazing.

contact.name: Your Name
contact.message_placeholder: Write us a little message – we'd love to hear from you!
contact.thank_you: Yay! Thanks for reaching out! We'll get back to you super soon.
contact.title: We'd absolutely love to chat!
contact.paragraph: Whether you have a burning question, a brilliant suggestion, or just want to say hello — send us a message and we'll get back to you as quickly as we can!

footer.paragraph: Stay connected with Pawsitive – for charming new designs, exciting restocks, and heartwarming happy tail stories!

about.label: About Pawsitive
about.paragraph: At Pawsitive Collar, we believe pets aren’t just animals — they’re family. They bring joy, loyalty, and comfort into our lives, and they deserve products made with that same love.
about.paragraph2: That’s why our collars and tags blend thoughtful design with smart tech. They’re not just beautiful — they’re built to help you feel confident that your pet is safe and always just a scan away.
about.paragraph3: We obsess over every detail: the fit, the feel, the durability. Because our products don’t sit on shelves — they’re made to join muddy hikes, rainy walks, sunny naps, and everything in between.
about.paragraph4: Behind every product is a deep respect for animals and the humans who care for them. We don’t take that trust lightly — we wear it like a collar.

history.label: Our Story
history.paragraph: Pawsitive Collar was born in 2024 out of frustration and love. We were tired of bland, mass-produced pet gear that lacked both personality and function.
history.paragraph2: So we started small — just the two of us, sketching ideas and learning everything from scratch: design, 3D printing, smart tech. Every decision came from a simple question: what would *we* want for *our* own pets?
history.paragraph3: We launched with no investors, no big warehouse — just passion, a printer, and a very patient dog named Molli.
history.paragraph4: Today, we’re proud to be growing with a community of pet lovers who care deeply, just like we do.
history.paragraph5: Every message, photo, and story you send reminds us why we started — and keeps us moving forward.

sustainability.label: Greener PawPrint
sustainability.paragraph: Sustainability isn’t just a nice-to-have — it’s part of our foundation.
sustainability.paragraph2: We power our workshop with green energy and use durable, low-waste materials like PETG and paracord. Our 3D printing process is efficient and designed to minimize excess.
sustainability.paragraph3: Each collar and tag is made to order, by hand. No overproduction, no shortcuts — just intentional craft, one piece at a time.
sustainability.paragraph4: We're constantly looking for better ways to reduce our footprint and grow responsibly. Because our love for animals includes the planet they call home.
sustainability.paragraph5: Better for pets. Better for people. Better for the planet.

team.label: Meet Pawsitive
team.paragraph: We’re Cintia and Dezso, partners in life and in purpose. What started as a weekend idea turned into something far bigger — and far more meaningful.
team.paragraph2: We do everything ourselves: design, development, braiding, packing, customer support — all from our little studio, surrounded by wagging tails and prototypes.
team.paragraph3: We still remember hand-delivering our first collar to a friend’s anxious pup — and the relief in their eyes when it worked. That moment drives everything we do.
team.paragraph4: We may be a tiny team, but our hearts are full — and our mission is clear: to build a brand that protects pets, looks fabulous and celebrates the bond you share.

hero.title: We’re always here for you!
hero.description: Got a question about our products or need a friendly hand with something? Just drop us a message — we're always absolutely delighted to help and love hearing from fellow pet lovers like you!
hero.follow: Follow us on social media for delightful behind-the-scenes glimpses, helpful tips, and exciting news about our latest creations!

product.title: Product & Usage
product.q1: What is an NFC pet tag?
product.a1: An NFC tag is a small pendant that your pet wears on its collar. If someone finds your pet, they can scan the tag with a smartphone and instantly see your contact details and important information about your pet.
product.q2: Do I need an app to use the tag?
product.a2: No. The finder only needs a smartphone with NFC functionality. A scan automatically opens the online page with your stored data.
product.a3: Yes. You can order as many tags as you like and register each pet individually.
product.q4: Can I change my data later?
product.a4: Yes. You can update your contact details and pet information at any time in your customer account. Changes take effect immediately.
product.q5: What happens if someone finds my pet?
product.a5: The finder scans the tag and instantly sees your shared contact details. At the same time, you automatically receive an email and SMS notification that your tag has been scanned. If the finder allows location sharing, you also receive the coordinates of the scan location – so you can react even faster.
product.q6: How long does an NFC tag last?
product.a6: The chip itself does not require a battery and is designed for lifelong functionality. To ensure it stays nice in your pet’s everyday life, our tags are made from robust materials. Like any everyday item, the surface may show slight wear over time – but functionality remains reliable.
product.a7: Yes, they are splash-proof and easily withstand your pet’s daily activities.

order.title: Order & Delivery
order.a1: Since we manufacture each tag individually for you (e.g., printing with name or special colors), production takes a few days. Once your tag is ready, shipping within Austria/Germany usually takes 2–4 business days. For other EU countries, delivery may take a little longer.
order.q2: Can I cancel or change my order?
order.a2: As long as your order has not yet been produced or shipped, you can contact us by email and we will try to make the change possible.
order.a3: You can pay by credit card, PayPal, Klarna, and other common payment methods (depending on the options offered in the shop).

return.title: Returns & Withdrawal
return.a1: Yes, you have the legal right to withdraw from the purchase within 14 days without giving any reason.
return.q2: Who covers the return shipping costs?
return.a2: For a normal withdrawal, you bear the return shipping costs yourself. If the error is on our side (e.g., defective tag, wrong item), we of course cover the return costs.
return.q3: Are there exceptions to the right of withdrawal?
return.a3_1: Yes. The right of withdrawal does not apply to custom-made products that are clearly tailored to you.
return.a3_3: NFC tags with name engraving or individual printing
return.a3_4: Collars with name embroidery or custom sizing
return.a3_6: Standard collars where only size/color was chosen from the shop
return.q4: How do I exercise my right of withdrawal?
return.a4: Simply send us an email with your order number and your withdrawal request. You will then receive all return instructions.

security.title: Security & Data Protection
security.q1: Which data does the finder of my pet see?
security.a1: The finder always sees your phone number and email address so they can reach you quickly and reliably. Whether your address is also displayed is up to you in the settings.
security.a2: Securely in our system, in accordance with GDPR requirements.
security.q3: Can I have my data deleted?
security.a3: Yes, you can request deletion of your data at any time. Just send us a message.
security.a4: Didn't find the answer you were looking for? Feel free to contact us at info@pawsitivecollar.com or via the contact form.
